alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 7:46PM MST until January 03 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch are expected. Visibility may be reduced to a quarter of a mile or less at times. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...From 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening to 5 AM MST /6 AM CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel with slick roads and reduced visibility. Power outages and tree damage are possible from the ice accumulations.
info.instruction: Consider adjusting travel plans or use extreme caution when driving as road conditions may deteriorate rapidly. Check road conditions before traveling by dialing 511 or searching online for your state`s road conditions page. Make sure to charge all essential electronic devices including medical equipment.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
